title: I want to start a pop band in India. I am a girl. Where can I find my bandmate? - Quora

response.answer_text: starting a youtube channel is the best way, you can start as a soloist and once you get a fair amount of viewers and subscribers you can put up applications. or if you don’t want to start a band on your own, you could always use different social media sites you use regularly and put up applications there. the best websites you can use for applications is google forms! or if you don’t seem to be interested in that it's always possible to take interviews whether it be online or in person.
I mean, im looking for a bandmate right now, lol. I was starting to think of recording some joints by March 2021. Dm me on instagram Login • Instagram or reddit, my ID is StygianMusic there.
